content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with Max Müller. He is a potential tenant from Germany, interested in renting an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment. I started with an asking price of 1000 euros, and after several rounds of negotiation, we agreed on a price of 1000 euros.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final agreed price was 1000 euros.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner at 7. There were no issues with the interaction, but the negotiation was straightforward and focused on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator
